body.p: In this article [1], the first author affiliation needs to be revised as “Department of infection Management, medical department, Hebei Key Laboratory of Stomatology, Hebei Clinical Research Center for Oral Diseases, School and Hospital of Stomatology, Hebei Medical University, Shijiazhuang, 050017, PR China”.

fn.p: The online version of the original article can be found at 10.1186/s12903-023-03369-1.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

ref.mixed-citation: Du Y, Zhao F, Tao R, Liu B. Effect of forceful suction and air disinfection machines on aerosol removal. BMC Oral Health. 2023;23(1):652. 10.1186/s12903-023-03369-1.
